metadata.title: Satellite-tracked drifter trajectories

creators.name: Atmospheric Research (OAR), Pacific Marine Environmental Laboratory (PMEL)

metadata.description: Trajectories (longitude, latitude, time) of drift buoys tracked by satellite  Data supporting NPMR project "Influences of mesoscale eddies on shelf-slope exchange."  Exploration of physical processes at the shelf edge and outer shelf, particularly instabilities and eddies in the Bering Slope Current, that result in advection of nutrient-rich waters onto the shelf.  An NPMR project
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Data supporting NPMR project "Influences of mesoscale eddies on shelf-slope exchange."  Exploration of physical processes at the shelf edge and outer shelf, particularly instabilities and eddies in the Bering Slope Current, that result in advection of nutrient-rich waters onto the shelf.
